Rage.name: Rage
Rage.description: Drives the Fighter and their nearby allies into a fit of rage, increasing all power stats temporarily.

ranks.description: Drives the Fighter and their nearby allies into a fit of rage, increasing all power stats temporarily.

Stomp.name: Stomp
Stomp.description: Stomps at the ground, dealing $DMG damage to nearby targets. Applies a snare condition.

ranks.description: Stomps at the ground, dealing $DMG damage to nearby targets. Applies a snare condition.

Execute.name: Execute
Execute.description:
Strikes adjacent targets, dealing 
$DMG damage. Applies a fatal condition.

ranks.description:
Strikes adjacent targets, dealing 
$DMG damage. Applies a fatal condition.

Divine.name: Divine
Divine.description: Places a holy well below the paladin, damaging nearby targets and healing nearby allies / caster by $DMG over time. Generates high threat.

ranks.description: Places a holy well below the paladin, damaging nearby targets and healing nearby allies / caster by $DMG over time. Generates high threat.

Cadence_Aura.name: Cadence Aura
Cadence_Aura.description: Provides the Paladin with the grace and rhythm of mind, increasing the magic power and magic defense stats by 35.

ranks.description: Provides the Paladin with the grace and rhythm of mind, increasing the magic power and magic defense stats by 35.

Bulwark.name: Bulwark
Bulwark.description: Decreases stamina usage when blocking attacks by 60%. Additionally increases defense and magic defense by 10.

ranks.description: Decreases stamina usage when blocking attacks by 60%. Additionally increases defense and magic defense by 10.

Cyclone.name: Cyclone
Cyclone.description: The Fighter throws their weapon as a boomerang, dealing $DMG constant damage as it collides with targets.

ranks.description: The Fighter throws their weapon as a boomerang, dealing $DMG constant damage as it collides with targets.

Shockwave.name: Shockwave
Shockwave.description: Smashes the ground and emits a shockwave, dealing $DMG damage to targets. Additionally has a chance to apply a snare condition.

ranks.description: Smashes the ground and emits a shockwave, dealing $DMG damage to targets. Additionally has a chance to apply a snare condition.

Lethal_Strike.name: Lethal Strike
Lethal_Strike.description: Charge and release skill. Sends the Fighter into a dash, landing a heavy force attack on hit, dealing $DMG damage.

ranks.description: Charge and release skill. Sends the Fighter into a dash, landing a heavy force attack on hit, dealing $DMG damage.

Blood_Gush.name: Blood Gush
Blood_Gush.description: Deals $DMG damage to nearby targets, then applies a bleed condition to them.

ranks.description: Deals $DMG damage to nearby targets, then applies a bleed condition to them.

Reflect.name: Reflect
Reflect.description: Allows the Fighter to reflect 20% melee damage back to the target if successfully parried. Additionally increases parry window time and parry stagger time towards targets by 40%.

ranks.description: Allows the Fighter to reflect 20% melee damage back to the target if successfully parried. Additionally increases parry window time and parry stagger time towards targets by 40%.

Shield_Bash.name: Shield Bash
Shield_Bash.description: Deals $DMG damage to adjacent targets, then applies a snare condition.

ranks.description: Deals $DMG damage to adjacent targets, then applies a snare condition.
